items.title: What we know about Spain's worst rail disaster in over a decade
items.description: What caused the train to derail remains unclear but officials say an investigation has been launched.

items.title: Ghana arrests Nigerians accused of running cyber-crime networks
items.description: There is a growing trend of foreigners being lured to Ghana under the pretext of lucrative work.

items.title: Swiss deadly fire bar owners' lawyers condemn 'vindictiveness'
items.description: Lawyers for the Moretti couple say "lies" have been circulating about their clients, in their first public statement since the fire.

items.title: South African team helps search for politician swept away by Mozambique floodwaters
items.description: Mozambique President Daniel Chapo cancels a trip to Davos due to severe floods in the country

items.title: Trump ties Greenland demands to Nobel Prize in message to Norway leader
items.description: The US president says he no longer feels obliged to think only of peace, after not being awarded the annual prize.
